text: <@U05BC4T17T4> the programable email uses a different parser for HUBL and is processed in two stages. using custom variables is problematic. I had hell getting it working. this doc outlines some of the issues. <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1BxxVwSgBcPZ1GdmaaNcoj2fgKSrM2ORZA_fiX7cHER8/edit>. I worked with our success manager and the product team to test a fix that resolved the issue. Not sure if that fix has been released yet.

Hello!

Would someone know the best way to add a condition to Custom Object Dynamic Pages that would only create the page if a certain property was checked.
â€¢ Example: When the "Object Ready" property is checked to *Yes* a dynamic page is created. If it is _*NOT*_ checked to *Yes*, a dynamic page is not created.
Thanks!
